newsitem.title: USA: Nebraska fed cattle trade nil, few bids - USDA.
newsitem.headline: Nebraska fed cattle trade nil, few bids - USDA.

text.p: Trading on slaughter steers and heifers was at a standstill, USDA said. Buyer inquiry fair, although most just taking inventory at this time.
Few bids of $105.00 per cwt on a dressed basis reported on "front end" cattle. Seller interest light, and many pricing stock above $106.00. Last volume price test Thursday at $105.00-$106.00
Live basis sales - Equivalent 3 percent shrink delivered and FOB, some FOB 4% shrink. Dressed basis delivered (paid on hot carcass weights) Sales confirmed - None For the week - 400
